body: Reddit didn’t decline because of the number of users per se, it declined because the admins chose censorship and social engineering over free speech.  They wanted a “kinder, gentler” platform that just didn’t match their tyrannical voting and moderation system.  SRS syndrome broke reddit.  SRS has now infected the real world.
